resources.string: PreviousNext This lesson teaches you to Create the Views Create the Fragment Add a ViewPager Customize the Animation with PageTransformer Try it out DOWNLOAD THE SAMPLE APP Animations.zip Screen slides are transitions between one entire screen to another and are common with UIs like setup wizards or slideshows. This lesson shows you how to do screen slides with a ViewPager provided by the support library. ViewPagers can animate screen slides automatically. Here\'s what a screen slide looks like that transitions from one screen of content to the next:PreviousNext This lesson teaches you to Create the Views Create the Fragment Add a ViewPager Customize the Animation with PageTransformer Try it out DOWNLOAD THE SAMPLE APP Animations.zip Screen slides are transitions between one entire screen to another and are common with UIs like setup wizards or slideshows.
